New Records: Lockie Ferguson became the second bowler to deliver four maidens in a T20I
Key Match Events: New Zealand chased down a paltry target of 79 with seven wickets and 46 balls to spare
Ferguson's figures of 3 for 0 from his four overs
Conway and Williamson added 34 runs for the third wicket - New Zealand's highest partnership of the tournament
Post-Match Reflections: Kane Williamson coy on T20I future after New Zealand's World Cup exit
Ferguson does the (almost) unimaginable, returns 4-4-0-3 vs PNG
Miscellaneous Highlights: The weather was a primary reason Kane Williamson inserted the opposition upon winning the toss
PNG's batting was limited by the conditions and the New Zealand attack
Others: Kabua Morea's redemption after being left out for two matches
Ferguson's record outing will be remembered as a memorable sidenote to a forgettable T20 World Cup
